items.title: Introduction
items.description: Re-usable components built using Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.

items.title: Installation
items.description: How to install dependencies and structure your app.

items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

items.title: Progress
items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task, typically displayed as a progress bar.
